Articles.Content:
Well I'd heard Kerbal being enthused about when listening to the "Skeptics Guide to the Universe" podcasts. On Friday a took another look at it on Steam, saw the discount so couldn't resist. In fact as it was a time limited discount I decided to get Mrs TopKwork a steam account and buy her a copy of Kerbal as well, for Christmas!! Not sure if that was entirely wise. I may now get chased around the solar system when a household chore needs doing . So you may occasionally find me hiding out on the dark side of the Mun ... if I can work out how to get there.

See you all in space.
